name: Zenost Shortcodes
author: Imran Ahmed Khan

sections.description:
Zenost shortcodes plugin used for shortcodes embedding in your posts, pages and widgets for headings, buttons, accordians, columns, lists and toggles. It is supported by font awesome. Insert directly or use the WYSIWYG editor to insert anywhere.

Installation

  1. Download the Zensot Shortcodes Plugin.
  2. In your WordPress Administration, go to Plugins > Add New > Upload, and select the plugin ZIP file.
  3. Activate the plugin.
  4. Done!.

Now you can insert shortcodes directly or by using the WYSIWYG editor in posts, pages or widgets.

Support

Contact the plugin author: Imran Ahmed Khan

Developer

Are you a developer want to contribute to develop this plugin? Go to Contact Us.
Credits
The Font Awesome font is licensed under the SIL Open Font License can be found at http://scripts.sil.org/OFL.

Bootstrap is licensed under the MIT License can be found at
Github.
